title: HySCAN
subheader: Hydrogen Safety Codes & Standards Applicability Navigator
description: As a developer, I supported users in navigating hydrogen (H2) codes and standards, ensuring compliance and safety in their systems. HySCAN, a vital component of the H2Tools suite, facilitated this process with intuitive workflows. It efficiently identified and categorized areas of adherence, empowering users with tailored solutions for enhanced safety and efficiency.

title: Developer Portfolio
subheader: Personal Showcase of Projects and Skills
description: A developer portfolio showcasing my projects and skills. Built with React, Vite, TypeScript, Material-UI, and Tailwind CSS. Designed to present my work in an organized and visually appealing manner.
